# Document Title {.tabset .tabset-pills}

## Results

Required Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(resultsoutput)
library(lavaan)
library(sjPlot)
```


Import Data
```{r}
## Import Data
data <- read_delim("filepath", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE) %>% 
```

---

---

### Descriptives 

```{r}
descriptives(data)
```

---

### First-order Correlations {.tabset .tabset-pills}

#### Correlation Matrix

```{r}
sjt.corr(data)
```

#### Correlation Plot
```{r}
cor.plot(data)
```

---

### CFA {.tabset .tabset-pills}

```{r warning=TRUE}
factors <- c()
model <- 
fit <- cfa(model=model, data=data, mimic = "EQS", missing="listwise", std.lv = TRUE)
```

#### Summary Output
```{r}
sem.sig(fit)
sem.fitmeasures(fit)
sem.factorloadings(fit)
sem.factorcor(fit, factors = factors)
sem.rsquared(fit)
```

#### Residual Correlation Matrix
```{r}
sem.residuals(fit)
```


#### Full Output
```{r}
summary(fit, fit.measures=TRUE, standardized=TRUE)
modificationIndices(fit, sort.=TRUE, minimum.value=3)
```

---
---

### SEM {.tabset .tabset-pills}

```{r warning=TRUE}
factors <- c()
model <- '
# measurement model

# regressions

# covariances

# variances

 '
fit <- sem(model=model, data=data, mimic = "EQS", missing="listwise", std.lv = FALSE)
```

#### Summary Output
```{r}
sem.sig(fit)
sem.fitmeasures(fit)
sem.factorloadings(fit)
sem.paths(fit)
sem.factorcor(fit, factors = factors)
sem.rsquared(fit)
```

#### Residual Correlation Matrix
```{r}
sem.residuals(fit)
```


#### Full Output
```{r}
summary(fit, fit.measures=TRUE, standardized=TRUE)
modificationIndices(fit, sort.=TRUE, minimum.value=3)
```
